_comment: VIP snapshot fixtures per GAME_RULES.md. Seeds discovered via seed_hunt.py.

VIP_BUY_001._comment: VIP Buy Feature bonus - expects bonusVariant=vip_buy, 11x multiplier applied

NATURAL_001._comment: Natural scatter bonus - expects bonusVariant=standard, no VIP multiplier

CAP_STRESS_001._comment: Cap verification - NOTE: No natural seed found that triggers cap (max observed ~2900x vs 25000x cap). This test uses synthetic verification.
CAP_STRESS_001.synthetic_reason: Cap not naturally reachable with current math (max ~2900x vs 25000x cap). Verified via unit test with MockRNG.
